155332222.title: 'Sally'

1553322222.content:
"Uhn.." Sally groaned as her dazed mind woke itself up, eyelids parting to find herself in a dingy unlit cell, lying on what had to be one of the stiffest mattresses she had the displeasure of sleeping on. Instinctively reaching for her ringblades, she was rather ticked off to discover not just their absence, but the rest of her clothes as well!

"Great, not just a kidnapper, but a pervert or worse," she mumbled to herself, deliberately downplaying just how potentially dangerous her situation currently was.

Vision still adjusting to the dim lighting, she haphazardly rolled off the bed onto her chest, practically kissing the smooth concrete floor. All the more alert thanks to its frigidity, she let out an 'eep' as she scrambled to her feet, a bit more prepared to face any other unsavoury surprises.

"Wherever I am, it's not one of Eggman's bases," she mused to herself as she approached the bars which kept her confined, testing their strength, "otherwise he'd have it all done up in metal panelling. Not to mention better craftsmanship, too.."

A soft hissing and whirring from behind alerted her to some sort of machine lurking behind her in the darkness, Freedom Fighter training kicking in as she spun around to face her would-be attacker, letting out a gasp as she did so.

"What's the matter, Sally? You seem as though you've seen a ghost," a modulated imitation from her voice sounded out from the robot before her. The Sallybot, long-thought destroyed, was seemingly back with a vengeance and decked out in Sally's pilfered clothing!

"It's been so long since we've last met, after all."

----------


Ooh, a cliffhanger! Don't you just hate those? Well, only you can change that! You've got three delectable storylines to follow through with!
